description: Two brothers have brought fresh life to this exciting bistro in the heart of the Prenestino-Centocelle district, where the delicious cuisine is prepared by Paolo and the wine selection overseen by Daniele. The menu features a good balance of meat, fish and vegetarian dishes with a focus on seasonal ingredients and the best market produce. Very popular, so booking is recommended!
